alert.note: Alert for Christian; Sangamon; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 02 at 2:19PM CDT until May 02 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Southern Christian County in central Illinois... South central Sangamon County in central Illinois... Southern Shelby County in central Illinois... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 217 PM CDT, a dust channel was near Morrisonville, or 10 miles west of Taylorville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 78 and 81. Interstate 57 near mile marker 169. Locations impacted include... Taylorville, Pana, Pawnee, Kincaid, Divernon, Morrisonville, Stewardson, Cowden, Tower Hill, Bulpitt, Jeisyville, Tovey, Herrick, Rosamond, Clarksburg, Sigel, Owaneco, Palmer, Oconee and Sangchris Lake State Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
